description:
Discover the latest addon for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020: Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport! Released today, this addon brings a highly detailed and realistic version of Dhaka‚Äôs main airport to your virtual skies. Join us as we explore its features, from handcrafted buildings to precise runway placements. Don‚Äôt miss out on this essential addon for your MSFS 2020 experience!

It is the primary hub of most of airlines in Bangladesh including Air Astra, Novoair, US-Bangla Airlines, and the national flag carrier Biman Bangladesh Airlines. The annual passenger handling capacity of the airport is 18.5 million passengers.

The airport is located in Kurmitola, 11 nautical miles (20.37 kilometres; 12.66 miles) north of downtown Dhaka
